title: Final Death
description: Salvation comes with a price.Dominique conquered the evil within her only to discover her one true love now must kill her. To save her friends from sharing her fate, she ditches them and goes on the run. With Trent left for dead in the past, she doesn't know Infiniti and Fleet have banded together and are fighting to find her.Unsure of who to trust, she takes a chance on a stranger.Trusting the advice of a mysterious guy who claims to be an ally from her first life, Dominique sets out on her own missionâ€”kill or be killed. With her friends in hot pursuit and her new hunter closing in, time is running out. To survive, Dominique must finish what was started lifetimes ago. Or finally face her final death.
author: Rose Garcia
